title.bibl: Il Corriere Italico, Feb. 20, 1937. Music and J. C. Petrillo

div.bibl: Il Corriere Italico, Feb. 20, 1937. MUSIC AND J. C. PETRILLO

body.p: President James C. Petrillo of the Chicago Federation of Musicians, an outstanding leader of unquestionable honesty and integrity of character, has always championed the cause of music.

As commissioner for the Chicago Park District he has done his utmost to secure band concerts in Grant Park, where millions of people have enjoyed great performances under the batons of such well-known leaders as Cavallo, Hand, Thavius, Marcelli, Dash, Baimum, Bachman, and Bendix.
